content:
BuildStatusEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the StatusEventRaised event of a build.

In this Article

public delegate void BuildStatusEventHandler(object sender, BuildStatusEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
BuildStatusEventHandler
